root.texto: Financial support from the international community to #RebuildIraq. #Iraq2018 [thread] #Turkey: $5 billions in form of facilitations and loans. #Kuwait: $2 billions; $1 billion as loans, the rest as investments. #KSA: $1.5 billions; $1 billion for rebuilding efforts, $500 millions to support Saudi exports to #Iraq. #Qatar: $1 billions in form of loans and investments. Islamic Developement Bank: $500 millions financing for infrastructure. #EU: $400 millions in form of investments. #US: $3 billions credit line extension by US Export-Import Bank. #Finland: $10 millions in form of donations for humanitarian projects. #Germany: $500 millions in assistance. #UK: $1 billion annually in form of export credit over 10 years. #Japan: $100 million contribution this year through UN agencies and international organizations. #UAE: $500 millions for rebuilding and $5.5 billions in form of private investments. Last but not least (hopefully), read this thread by @SajadJiyad that gives some background information about the conference. https://t.co/H9Bh3JCx4F Arab Fund for Economic and Social Developement: $1.5 billions in funding. #Italy: €260 millions in form of easy loans, €11.5 millions as direct aid.
